name: Orcish Wildling Minstrel
description: The Orcish Wildling Minstrel is a medium-sized humanoid adept at both combat and storytelling, using musical talents to inspire and influence.
memorable: Its ability to charm and manipulate foes while bolstering allies makes it a unique presence on the battlefield.
goals: To preserve tribal history through song and support allies in combat.
relations: Associated with orc tribes, likely to be seen with other tribal figures or spellcasters.
environment: Typically found in tribal settlements or wilderness areas, often among other orcish tribesmen.
strengths: Excellent spellcasting and support abilities, capable of healing and inspiring allies while controlling the battlefield.
weaknesses: Relatively low strength and constitution, making it vulnerable in direct confrontations.
attacks: Wields a rapier for melee attacks, uses vicious mockery to inflict psychic damage and disadvantage on foes.
most_powerful_ability: Hypnotic Pattern creates an incapacitating effect on enemies, controlling their actions during combat.
senses: Passive perception of 11 indicates average awareness.
skills: Proficient in deception, performance, and persuasion, allowing for effective manipulation during interactions.
additional_information: Can cast legend lore instinctively every 30 days without components.
Manipulative through charm and illusion spells.
Uses songs to preserve communal memory.
spellcasting: 5th-level spellcaster using Charisma for spells, with a variety of supportive and controlling spells.
